mapper.select: SELECT e.`id`, e.`password`, e.`name`, e.`authority`, e.`sex`, e.`birthday`, d.`name` AS department, #部门 j.`description` AS job, # 工作名称 ed.`description` AS eduLevel, #学历 e.`spcialty`, e.`address`, e.`tel`, e.`email`, e.`state`, e.`remark` FROM employee e, department d, edu_level ed, job j WHERE e.`department` = d.`id` AND e.`job` = j.`code` AND e.`edu_level` = ed.`code`
